summary: This is an email chain from February 2019 regarding updates on human trafficking cases, specifically requesting status updates on the Epstein case and mentioning the recently opened R. Kelly case. It involves an Assistant United States Attorney coordinating human trafficking cases in the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the initial request for updates on human trafficking cases, including the Epstein case, and mentions meeting with someone to provide an overview of cases.

events.title: Request for Epstein Case Update
events.description: An email request is made for the latest update on the Epstein human trafficking case, including its investigation status.

events.title: Opening of R. Kelly Case
events.description: Mention that the office has recently opened a case on R. Kelly, indicating parallel human trafficking investigations.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain from February 2019 discussing human trafficking case updates.
It specifically requests a status update on the Epstein case investigation.
It mentions the recent opening of a case against R. Kelly, showing concurrent high-profile human trafficking investigations.
The correspondence involves a Human Trafficking Co-Coordinator from the U.S. Attorney's Office in the Southern District of New York.
